mapper.select: select * from menu order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into menu values( seq_menu_id.nextval, #{restaurant}, #{name}, #{price}, #{type, typeHandler=MenuTypeHandler}, #{taste} )
mapper.update: update menu set restaurant = #{restaurant}, name = #{name}, price = #{price}, type = #{type, typeHandler=MenuTypeHandler}, taste = #{taste} where id = #{id}
